rule: The output must disregard the subjects of the photo and their characteristics first.
input: A beach under moonlight with waves gently crashing and people dancing around a bonfire.
output: Capture the serene beach illuminated by a silvery full moon, casting soft shadows on the sandy shore. Waves embrace the shore delicately, their gentle ripples reflecting the lunar glow. Amidst this tranquil scene, gather together warm-hearted individuals in flowing attire, joyfully dancing around an alive bonfire that emits a rich orange and red blaze. The firelight animates their lively movements while casting playful shadows on the sands. As the cool night air fills with laughter and music, set against a backdrop of distant lighthouses and star-spangled skies, this scene encapsulates warmth, joy, and connection under the mystical ambiance of moonlit nights.
complianceText:
The output generated by the chatbot complies with the description. It is crafted in a single paragraph and does not exceed 80 words. It describes the subjects (beach, full moon, waves, individuals dancing), their characteristics (serene, silvery, soft shadows, gentle ripples, joyful, flowing attire), timing (nighttime with a full moon), and lighting (moonlight and bonfire light). It also describes the background (distant lighthouses and star-spangled skies) and conveys the feeling (warmth, joy, and connection under a mystical ambiance).

OK
